page.title: 20LIMERIGG VILLAGE PARK
page.content: The village park is divided into a play area and a football pitch. In the play area there are wooden swings for the older children and plastic swings with safety bars for the younger ones. It also has a metal rocking horse and 3 climbing frames. In the summer,the village committee organise a sports day. All the children under 12 years of age are allowed to take part. There are races, including a marathon,plus high jump and long jump. The boy and girl with most points in the medal events are each presented with a shield. Round about June,a football competition is held. Several schools in the district compete. A silver cup and gold medals are presented to the winning team and the runners-up each receive a silver medal.
